active_learning.discussion_prompt: Evaluate the trade-offs between exhaustive security unit testing and agile development timelines. Using OWASP WSTG categories (e.g., Input Validation, Authentication), debate which security checks are essential at the unit level versus higher integration tests. Consider real-world misconceptions that security testing inevitably slows down development.

Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding
